page.title: 15TRADE
page.content:
The types of trade in Weaverham are Green grocers, Butchers, Newsagents, Pet shops, Florists, Hairdressers, Chemists, Clothes shops, Food shops, DIY shops and an Art Gallery.
A Butchers Day: Mr Minshall is a Butcher and Green grocer. He opens both shops at 7.30am. On Tuesday he collects meat and fish from the market. His job involves the preparing and purchasing of meat and slaughtering of animals. He grows his own vegetables to sell. Mr. Minshall's job involves more hands than machines. He and his employees wear special clothing, an overall and apron. The busiest days of the week are Thursdays and Saturdays. The busiest times of the year are Christmas and Easter when people buy special food.{
